reviewText: This is the best anime story I have ever watch or read. I own the whole graphic novel series and the Anime is  Incredible. You got to watch this  tape and the whole series, unfortunately the company that got the rights  for the series did a poor marketing job on it and it got buried in the  Dragonballz and Sailor moon crowd. If you like loeve story, with whacky  characters this is  the best thing there is.
